name: forDiabetes
0:
”Alexa, open 4 diabetes”
”Alexa, tell 4 diabetes to get my latest glucose”
”Alexa, tell 4 diabetes to add a new glucose”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four diabetes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Designed for managing diabetes, this app is a handy tool that enables you to track and monitor key diabetes data.
Whether you have Type 1, Type 2, LADA, gestational diabetes, or pre-diabetes, forDiabetes tracks almost all aspects of diabetes treatment and facilitates your everyday life.
It supports different units for blood Glucose (mg/dL or mmol/L)

The automatic data entry using 3rd party apps and devices in combination with the effortless manual import by using different algorithms make data collection an easy task for you. The app analyzes all information and exports detailed reports that you can share with your caregivers online anytime.

Web application: https://web.fordiabetes.app
Android app: https://bit.ly/2kIRJ4u
iOS app: https://apple.co/2J4bkuu

DISCLAIMER
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

forDiabetes: a step to a better life!
